forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
